sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
midway between two places
, je enako oddaljeno od dveh krajev.

seg.quote: St Germain is midway between Cherbourg and Granville.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
midway through a period of time
, se zgodi sredi tistega obdobja.

seg.quote: She arrived midway through the afternoon.
